wikipedia_page.main: Henry Sutton Harmer (8 July 1883 – 9 January 1958) was a British athlete who competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics in London. He was born in West Ham and died in Sidmouth. His brother, Frederick Harmer, was also a British Olympian. In the 100 metres event, Harmer did not finish in his first round heat and was eliminated from competition.

Frederick William Harmer (18 July 1884 – 7 March 1919) was a British track and field athlete who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. In 1908 he was eliminated in the semi-finals of the 400 metre hurdles competition. He was born in West Ham and died in Shenfield. His brother, Henry Harmer, was also a British Olympian.Frederick Harmer's profile at Sports Reference.com
